text:
Hey all! I'm looking for a few freelance software developers to answer some questions on topics related to becoming a freelance software developer / programmer / engineer.

I am writing a few articles for <http://Contra.com|Contra.com> and with your answers, I will feature a link to your website and also a link to your Contra profile. If you don't have a Contra profile, it's quick and easy to set up. When I upload the articles on Contra, I can also tag you in them (they are uploaded as projects), which can help build your reputation on the site and encourage referrals.

Please DM me or email me at <mailto:jenna@ladycontent.com|jenna@ladycontent.com>. I will need the answers by this Monday, the latest. TY!
